Texts.Chs: 虽然内容有些奇怪，但里面的配方好像是真的。
Texts.Eng: Despite the odd contents, a useful recipe lays scrawled within

Texts.Chs: [在靠近这本书的顶端，详细地描述了一种名为Byakhee生物的培养方式，文字是红色的，或许是血？下面是内容]...远古之书...两份远古残卷...偏方三八面体
Texts.Eng: [over top of a strange text detailing the care and feeding of one creature called Byakhee, red text...perhaps in blood...details the schematic for a weapon] ELDER TOME....2 ELDER FRAGMENT....TRAPEZOHEDRON.......SACRIFICE..
